definitions.definition: A man in a marriage or marital relationship, especially in relation to his spouse.
examples: You should start dating so you can find a suitable husband .

definitions.definition: A manager of property ; one who has the care of another's belongings, owndom , or interests ; a steward ; an economist .
The master of a house ; the head of a family ; a householder .
A tiller of the ground ; a husbandman .
The male of a pair of animals .
A large cushion with arms meant to support a person in the sitting position; a husband pillow .
examples: While reading her book, Sally leaned back against her husband , wishing it were the human kind.

main_definition: A man in a marriage or marital relationship, especially in relation to his spouse.
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) A manager of property ; one who has the care of another's belongings, owndom , or interests ; a steward ; an economist .
( archaic ) A prudent or frugal manager .
( somewhat dated ) The master of a house ; the head of a family ; a householder .
A tiller of the ground ; a husbandman .
The male of a pair of animals .
A large cushion with arms meant to support a person in the sitting position; a husband pillow .
( UK dialectal ) A polled tree ; a pollard .
